segments.text: Good evening . Welcome to Mansion Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a reservation . My name is Rodgers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . Welcome , Mr . Rodgers . Would you please fill out the registration card ? How are you doing today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 0h , good . I have a long day and it's good to get here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Rodgers , how would you handle your account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will check to see if there any messages for you ? Well , here is one message for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I have an 8 o ' clock appointment tomorrow morning , I would like a wake-up call .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , I can take care of that for you . What time would you like the wake-up call ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Rodgers , this is George . He will take care of your luggage and show you to your room . If there is anything I can do for you , please let me know .
segments.speaker: S1
